comments:
step to reproduce:

   - create a java project, a1 (add engine.jar to build path)
   - create a java project, a2 (add engine.jar to build path)
   - create a report project, add a report, add a label, and map the label to a class define in either project.

expected behavior:

   - script is executed.

actual behavior:

the java debug project is not ready for M3. assign this bug to the RC build.

This seems to be fixed, I can not reproduce. Remember, the following jars are needed on build path for the projects: scriptapi.jar, model.jar and core.jar. I will remove the dependency on model and core.
